hero.name: Dipak Majumdar
hero.title: Full Stack Developer

about.title: About Me
description: Results-driven Software Developer with nearly 4 years of hands-on experience in full-stack web development, skilled in PHP, Laravel, Django, React.js, JavaScript, and MySQL. Adept at building scalable, user-focused applications with strong attention to performance and security. Experienced in VPS deployment, Git-based collaboration, Jenkins automation, and modern frontend frameworks. Passionate about learning new technologies, improving system efficiency, and delivering high-quality solutions that align with business goals.

summary.title: Summary
description: Results-oriented Full-Stack Developer with 3+ years of proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying high-performing web applications and dynamic websites. Skilled in PHP, Laravel, Django, React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and MySQL, with a strong focus on clean architecture, scalability, and performance optimization. Eager to contribute technical expertise and creative problem-solving to a forward-thinking team in a challenging software development role.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and modern JavaScript. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Built responsive websites and web applications. Worked with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create engaging user experiences.

item.name: Problem-Solving:
item.description: Strong ability to identify and resolve complex issues, ensuring secure, efficient, and user-friendly web applications.

item.name: Collaborative Team Player:
item.description: Effective at collaborating with team members, leveraging diverse perspectives to achieve project goals and deliver successful outcomes.

item.name: Adaptability:
item.description: Thrive in dynamic environments with a commitment to continuous learning and staying updated on industry trends and technologies.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
